mapper.insert: insert into DB_SYS_CLCHST (HST_DTM, TASKKY, SKUKEY, OWNRKY, DESC01, LOCASR, LOCATG, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, CMD_DIV) values (#{hstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locasr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locatg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmdDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select HST_DTM, TASKKY, SKUKEY, OWNRKY, DESC01, LOCASR, LOCATG, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, CMD_DIV from DB_SYS_CLCHST
